What do download buttons do?

Lyric Slideshow.

Removes chords and places lyrics on slides based on sections.

Lyric Handout.

Removes chords and places lyrics in a printable document.

Musician Chords

Places lyrics and chords in a printable document.

Why do my files look incorrect?

If you are having trouble, your issue most likely has to do with your inputs. Make sure your inputs follow this format:
[verse]
G C D
line 1 of the verse
G C D
line 2 of the verse
[chorus]
G Em C
line 1 of the chorus
G Em C
line 2 of the chorus

The reformatting is done based on brackets [] and newlines.
